CustomField.formula: IF((ShippingCity = 'Goiânia' || ShippingCity = 'Goiania' || ShippingCity = 'GOIANIA'|| ShippingCity = 'GOIÂNIA'), 7, IF(ShippingState = 'Goiás' && ShippingCity != 'Goiânia',10, IF(ShippingState = 'Tocantins' || ShippingState = 'Manaus' || ShippingCity = 'Manaus' || ((ShippingState = 'Pará' && ShippingCity = 'BELEM' ||ShippingState = 'Pará' && ShippingCity = 'BELÉM')) || ShippingState = 'Rondônia', 15, IF(ShippingState = 'Distrito Federal' || ShippingState = 'Mato Grosso' || ShippingState = 'Mato Grosso do Sul' || ShippingState = 'São Paulo' || ShippingState = 'Rio de Janeiro' || ShippingState = 'Maranhão' || ShippingState = 'Minas Gerais' || ShippingState = 'Bahia' || ShippingState = 'Espírito Santo', 10, IF(ShippingState = 'Roraima' || ShippingState = 'Ceará' || ShippingState = 'Piauí' || ShippingState = 'Rio Grande do Norte' || ShippingState = 'Paraíba' || ShippingState = 'Alagoas' || ShippingState = 'Sergipe' || ShippingState = 'Rio Grande do Sul' || ShippingState = 'Santa Catarina' || ShippingState = 'Paraná' || ShippingState = 'Pernambuco', 13, IF((ShippingState = 'Pará' && ShippingCity != 'Belém'), 20, IF((ShippingState = 'Amazonas' && ShippingCity != 'Manaus'), 30, IF(ShippingState = 'Roraima', 30, IF(ShippingState = 'Acre' || ShippingState = 'Amapá', 22, 0 )))))))))
CustomField.label: Prazo acordado para o Estado
